6.label: Air Temperature
6.description: A multilevel sensor report is sent to the nodes in this group

5.label: Temperature Upper Watermark value
5.description: If the measured temperature surpasses this watermark, a Basic Set is sent into Association Group 2.

6.label: Temperature Lower Watermark value
6.description: If the measured temperature drops below this watermark, a Basic Set is sent into Association Group 3. Allowable Range: 200-1000.

7.label: Humidity Upper Watermark value
7.description: If the measured relative humidity surpasses this watermark, a Basic Set is sent into Association Group 4.

8.label: Humidity Lower Watermark value
8.description: If the measured relative humidity drops below this watermark, a Basic Set is sent into Association Group 5.

9.label: Low Temperature Trigger Basic Set Value
9.description: This defines what Basic command shall be sent out into association group 3. Allowable Range: 0-99, 255.

10.label: High Temperature Trigger Basic Set Value
10.description: This defines what Basic command shall be sent out into association group 2. Allowable Range: 0-99, 255.

11.label: Low Humidity Trigger Basic Set Value
11.description: This defines what Basic command shall be sent out into association group 5. Allowable Range: 0-99, 255.

12.label: High Humidity Trigger Basic Set Value
12.description: This defines what Basic command shall be sent out into association group 4. Allowable Range: 0-99, 255.

13.label: Humidity Offset for Mould Danger Notification

64.label: Temperature Report Unit
64.description: Default: Celcius (EU version) or Fahrenheit (US version).

255.label: Factory Reset
255.description: This parameter helps reset configuration parameters and the device to factory defaults.

options.label: Reset all Parameter settings to their default settings.
Completely factory reset sensor and send device reset locally notification.
